featuresList.title: Carbon Footprint Calculation
featuresList.description: Measure the environmental impact of your organization's operations — from energy to logistics — through a user-friendly interface designed for comprehensive and accurate insights.

featuresList.title: Performance Analytics
featuresList.description: Turn data into action with real-time dashboards. Monitor progress, set goals, and prioritize carbon reduction strategies backed by visual metrics.

featuresList.title: Client & Subsidiary Management
featuresList.description: Ideal for consultants or multi-entity companies — manage multiple organizations with separate reports, insights, and consolidated billing, all from one platform.

featuresList.title: Centralized Report Hosting
featuresList.description: Securely store your sustainability reports with permanent access, shareable links, and automatic versioning — for seamless audits and client transparency.

featuresList.title: Decarbonization Plan
featuresList.description: Receive step-by-step guidance to reduce emissions across your operations. From assessment to action, we help you build and follow a tailored decarbonization roadmap aligned with your goals.

featuresList.title: Data Protection & Compliance
featuresList.description: Your data is hosted securely in Tunisia with full SSL encryption, regular backups, and GDPR compliance — giving you peace of mind and full sovereignty.

featuresList.title: Product-Level Emission Tracking
featuresList.description: Precisely calculate the carbon footprint of individual products across their lifecycle — enabling smarter design, procurement, and supply chain choices.

featuresList.title: Real-Time Product Insights
featuresList.description: Track and compare product emissions in real time with customizable dashboards. Discover trends, outliers, and improvement opportunities instantly.

featuresList.title: Portfolio Management for Consultants
featuresList.description: Manage multiple product lines or client portfolios in one place. Segment results by client, industry, or product type for tailored reporting.

featuresList.title: Centralized Report Hosting
featuresList.description: Securely store your sustainability reports with permanent access, shareable links, and automatic versioning — for seamless audits and client transparency.

featuresList.title: Waste Footprint Assessment
featuresList.description: Quantify the carbon impact of your waste streams — from disposal to recycling — with a guided tool built for facilities, municipalities, and advisors.

featuresList.title: Waste Reduction Dashboards
featuresList.description: Visualize trends in waste generation and treatment. Set reduction targets and monitor progress with real-time KPIs and clear analytics.

featuresList.title: Multi-Site or Multi-Client Tracking
featuresList.description: Manage multiple facilities or clients’ waste data from one dashboard — with separate tracking, reporting, and permissions for each.

featuresList.title: Digital Waste Reports
featuresList.description: Generate and host detailed reports on waste footprint and compliance — ready to share with regulators, partners, or internal stakeholders.
